text: Pascale Petit (born Anne-Marie Pettit; 27 February 1938) is a French actress. She appeared in more than fifty movies from 1957 to 2001. Petit was born in Paris. She became well known for her role in One Life (1958). Petit played Cleopatra in the 1962 movie A Queen for Caesar. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
